title: Jio Jamai
overview: Diya works in Jyotirani Devi's Company in Visakhapatnam, where all the employees are female. Jyotirani's daughter, Premarati appoints a man, Aditya as regional head of the company. Aditya falls in love with his colleague Diya. One day Aditya realises that Diya's parents are not going through a happy marriage even after 25 years togetherness. This also troubles the relationship between Diya and Aditya. To save the relationship of Diya's parents, the couple decide to act in a different manner. It leads to a series of laughter when Aditya's uncle comes to Visakhapatnam.
